message.entry: Invalid argument. Set the communication type to 'usb', 'wifi' or 'bluetooth'.

Invalid argument. Format arguments like this: legove3('bt','0016534119fd').
Invalid argument. Format arguments like this: legoev3('wifi','192.168.1.7','0016534119fd').
Invalid argument. Format arguments like this: legove3('usb').
